title: Google\Cloud\Monitoring\V3\WindowsBasedSli\PerformanceThreshold
name: PerformanceThreshold
description:
A PerformanceThreshold is used when each window is good when that window has a sufficiently high performance.

Generated from protobuf message google.monitoring.v3.WindowsBasedSli.PerformanceThreshold

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.performance
params.description: RequestBasedSli to evaluate to judge window quality.

params.name: data.basic_sli_performance
params.description: BasicSli to evaluate to judge window quality.

params.name: data.threshold
params.description: If window performance >= threshold, the window is counted as good.
